name: pressure

effect.sword_shield: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.legends_arceus: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.

short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

flavor_text.sword_shield: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
